title: Professor Java's Coffee Sanctuary
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This coffeehouse keeps on hand almond and soy milk for drinks and offers a food menu that includes a section with "veggie delights." Vegans could get the veggie hummer wrap or Anna's peppered penguin wrap or ask to omit cheese on other dishes. Has vegan cookies.
